name: UE5 Retro PSX Style Shooter (Prototype Testing - Game Mechanics)
name_original: UE5 Retro PSX Style Shooter (Prototype Testing - Game Mechanics)
description:
The Maze is going to be a retro PSX style, fast paced roguelike shooter using Unreal Engine 5.

I am putting out this prototype in the hope that you provide me some feedback for the followings:

  • player movement (WASD)
  • weapon pick up  (F)
  • firing, reloading (Left Mouse Button; R)
  • ammo pick up (just walk through them)
  • health and armor system and pick ups

I have a lot of fixing already in my mind, but I might miss something.

Content were used from Retro3DGraphicsCollection.

Thank you!
